name: Backstage (Votre Pseudo)
description:
### Story
Luc is panicked: he just realized he lost the last piece needed to end his day of work. Help him in his journey to find it.
### Controls
* A & D : Move Luc
* Space: Jump
* Left click: Use item (ajustable wrench)

### Softwares
* Unity & Visual Studio
* Krita
* Tracktion Waveform

### Credits

Coding, implementation & level design: Votre Pseudo
Drawings, animations & implementation: Hyblis
Level design, music, sounds & drawings: Klosen

Video game made for Global Game Jam 2021!

Source files: https://github.com/ViviFar/GGJ2021

Thanks for playing! Feel free to leave a feedback
